properties.areaDesc: Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm; Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; Peconic and Gardiners Bays; Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm; Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm; Long Island Sound West of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; New York Harbor; South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 15 at 3:39AM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and
seas 5 to 8 feet expected on the ocean waters and 3 to 6 feet
on Long Island Sound.

* WHERE...The Long Island Sound, New York Harbor, Peconic and
Gardiners Bays, South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through
Shinnecock Bay, Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20
nm, Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm, and
Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 7 AM Thursday to 1 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO 1 PM EST FRIDAY
